title: Pitch Black Trilogy (The Director's Cut Edition)
description:
==========================================================================================================================================================================




                                    Pitch Black
                                    ===========




==========================================================================================================================================================================


A group of marooned space travelers struggle for survival on a seemingly lifeless sun-scorched world.


==========================================================================================================================================================================


Directed By: David Twohy

MPAA: Rated R For Sci-Fi Violence And Gore, And For Language.

Runtime: 1 Hour, 51 Minutes, 53 Seconds

Genre: Action / Science Fiction / Thriller

Plot Keywords: Darkness / Survival / Desert Planet / Criminal / Spaceship

Country: USA

Language: English / Arabic

Color: Color

Resolution: 720 x 320

Format: Original Widescreen Presentation ( Aspect Ratio: 2.35:1 )

Sound Mix: Dolby Digital 5.1

System: NTSC

Release Date: 2000


==========================================================================================================================================================================




                             The Chronicles Of Riddick
                             =========================




==========================================================================================================================================================================


5 years after Pitch Black, the wanted criminal Riddick arrives on a planet called Helion Prime, and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.


==========================================================================================================================================================================


Directed By: David Twohy

MPAA: Rated R For Violence And Some Language.

Runtime: 2 Hours, 14 Minutes, 04 Seconds

Genre: Action / Adventure / Science Fiction / Thriller

Plot Keywords: Warrior / Planet / Necromongers / Attack / Sun

Country: USA

Language: English

Color: Color

Resolution: 720 x 304

Format: Original Widescreen Presentation ( Aspect Ratio: 2.35:1 )

Sound Mix: Dolby Digital 5.1

System: NTSC

Release Date: 2004


==========================================================================================================================================================================



==========================================================================================================================================================================


Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, Riddick finds himself up against an alien race of predators. Activating an emergency beacon alerts two ships: one carrying a new breed of mercenary, the other captained by a man from Riddick's past.


==========================================================================================================================================================================


Directed By: David Twohy

MPAA: Rated R For Strong Violence, Language And Some Sexual Content/Nudity.

Runtime: 2 Hours, 1 Minute, 35 Seconds

Plot Keywords: Planet / Left For Dead / Mercenary / Alien / Alien Predator

Genres: Action / Science Fiction / Thriller

Country: USA / UK

Language: English

Color: Color

Format: Original Widescreen Presentation ( Aspect Ratio: 2.35:1 )

Resolution: 720 x 304

Sound Mix: Dolby Digital 5.1

System: PAL

Release Date: 2013


==========================================================================================================================================================================




                         Ripped And Encoded By Legendarien
                         =================================
